pages.title: Yer a Wizard Steve
pages.text: Now that you have the $(item)Arcane Workbench$(), you need to get your hands on a $(item)Spellbook$(). As mentioned, these can be purchased from friendly $(thing)Wizards$(), but can also be found in old $(thing)Shrines$() and $(thing)Obelisks$() - all within the $(thing)Everbright$() and $(thing)Everdawn$(). Once you have a $(item)Spellbook$(), you will then need to identify it.

pages.title: identifying Spells
pages.text: When you first obtain a $(item)Spellbook$(), it will be unidentified - that is, you won't know exactly which spell it is.$(br2)To identify it, you will need to do one of these two things:$(li)Equip the spell to a $(item)Wand$() and $(thing)cast it a few times$().$(li)Use a $(item)Scroll of Identification$().

Equip spells to a wand in the $(l:quests/chap4/08arcaneworkbench)Arcane Workbench$() by placing it in the centre with the $(item)Spellbook$(). $(item)Magic Crystal$() can be used to fill it with $(thing)Mana$(), also in the $(l:quests/chap4/08arcaneworkbench)Arcane Workbench$(). As you use the $(item)Wand$(), it will gradually gain progression, until it can be upgraded.
Purchased from $(thing)Wizards$() or found in $(thing)Shrines$() and $(thing)Obelisks$().$(br2)Right-click to use, and identify 1 $(item)Unknown Spell$() from your inventory.
